mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,Student.Student_name as StudentName ,Student.Student_phone as StudentPhone ,Student.Student_id_number as StudentIdNumber ,Student.Student_photo as StudentPhoto ,Student.Student_email as StudentEmail ,Teacher.Teacher_name as TeacherName ,Teacher.Teacher_phone as TeacherPhone ,Teacher.Teacher_photo as TeacherPhoto ,Teacher.Teacher_email as TeacherEmail ,Teacher.Teacher_shanchang as TeacherShanchang ,Teacher.Teacher_lvli as TeacherLvli ,Teacher.Teacher_content as TeacherContent
FROM Teacher_Mes a left JOIN Student Student ON a.Student_id = Student.id left JOIN Teacher Teacher ON a.Teacher_id = Teacher.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.Teacher_id = #{params.TeacherId} )
and ( a.Student_id = #{params.StudentId} )
and a.Teacher_Mes_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherMesText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.Student_id IS NOT NULL
and Student.Student_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentName},'%')
and Student.Student_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentPhone},'%')
and Student.Student_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentIdNumber},'%')
and Student.Student_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.StudentEmail},'%')
and a.Teacher_id IS NOT NULL
and Teacher.Teacher_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherName},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherPhone},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherEmail},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherShanchang},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_lvli like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherLvli},'%')
and Teacher.Teacher_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.TeacherContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
